rasterizer.title: Rasterizer
description: Implemented a rasterizer that converts Scalable Vector Graphic (SVG) files into pixeled images.
Tested various methods of pixel sampling for texture mapping.

meshEdit.title: Mesh Edit
description: Simulated the physics of cloth by creating a mesh of springs and point masses.
Used verlet integration and other formulas to compute new positions.

pathTracer.title: Pathtracer
description: Produced renderings of 3D environments using ray intersections and bounding volume hierarchies.
Added support for direct and global illumination using Monte Carlo Path Tracing.

pathTracer2.title: Pathtracer 2
description: Simulated mirror and glass materials in a 3D environment using ray refraction/reflection.
Completed a thin-lens model capable of depth refocusing using ray intersections.

clothSimulator.title: Cloth Simulator
description: Simulated the physics of cloth by constructing a mesh of spring and point mass data structures.
Applied texture and displacement mapping using vertex and fragment shaders in GLSL.

celShading.title: Cel Shading
description: Produced and applied cel-shading to 3D models using Unityâ€™s built-in shader API.
Animated 3D models using blend trees and programmed basic combat system.

colorizing.title: Colorizing the Prokudin-Gorskii Photo Collection
description: Aligned colored-separated images using coarse-to-fine image pyramids.
Computed L2 norm over rescaled images as a metric for alignment.

filtersAndFrequencies.title: Fun with Filters And Frequencies
description: Formed hybrid images by combining the low pass and high pass filters of images.
Completed a multi-resolution blending algorithm using Gaussian and Laplacian stacks.
